scripts.compile: npm run compile:cjs && npm run compile:es6
scripts._webpack: export CSP_ALLOWED_HOSTS="http://localhost:9953 ws://localhost:908${PORT_OFFSET-0} http://localhost:908${PORT_OFFSET-0}"; npm run pty:nodejs && npm run _watch
scripts._webpackproxy: npm run pty:nodejs && (npm run proxy &) && npm run _watch
scripts._electron: npm run pty:electron && TARGET=electron-renderer npm run _watch
scripts.watch: npm run compile && concurrently -n EJS,ES6,WEBPACK --kill-others 'tsc --build tsconfig.json --watch' 'npm run watch:source' 'npm run _electron'
scripts.watch:webpack: npm run compile && concurrently -n EJS,ES6,WEBPACK --kill-others 'tsc --build tsconfig.json --watch' 'npm run watch:source' 'npm run _webpack'
scripts.watch:webpackproxy: npm run compile && concurrently -n EJS,ES6,WEBPACK --kill-others 'tsc --build tsconfig.json --watch' 'npm run watch:source' 'npm run _webpackproxy'
scripts.proxy: if [ -z "$TRAVIS_JOB_ID" ]; then npm run -s pty:nodejs; fi; kui-run-proxy
scripts.pty:rebuild: if [ -d node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch ]; then cd node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch && npm run install; fi
scripts.pty:electron: if [ -d node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch ]; then if [ ! -e node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc ]; then cp node_modules/@kui-shell/builder/npmrc node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc && npm run pty:rebuild; fi; fi
scripts.pty:nodejs: if [ -e node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc ]; then rm -f node_modules/node-pty-prebuilt-multiarch/.npmrc; npm run pty:rebuild; fi
scripts.test:electron: npm run kill && npm run _electron && KUI=$(echo "$(pwd)/bin/oui-ascii") kui-testv2
scripts.test:webpack: export PORT_OFFSET=${PORT_OFFSET-0}; npm run kill && npm run _webpack && MOCHA_RUN_TARGET=webpack kui-testv2
scripts.postinstall: npm run -s compile && npm run -s pty:electron
scripts.update: ncu -u -x "@types/yargs-parser,husky,electron,spectron,@types/webdriverio" && for i in plugins/*; do (cd $i && ncu -u -x electron,spectron,@types/webdriverio && rm -rf node_modules); done && rm -rf node_modules/ package-lock.json  && npm install
scripts.start: echo "use 'npm run watch' followed by 'npm run open'"

hooks.before:init: if [ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" = "linux" ]; then sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install wine; fi; npm run build:electron:all
